Hypertram 4000: World Tour

Creator

June 2025 - July 2025

Hypertram 4000: World Tour is an alt-control tram arcade game created for the 2025 Indie City All Stars game jam. Inspired by H2Overdrive and Densha de Go this game creates a time-attack style arcade experience in its three game modes: Precice Stop, Street Crossing, and Bowling!

As a Project Lead I was responsible for:

  • Origional concept of the game, putting a team together, and facilitating communication on deliverables.
  • Physical design and manufaturing of the game's controller.
  • Creating an art bible and refernce documentation to communicate artistic style and vision.
  • Providing feedback on iterations from the art team, and implementing all art in game.

As a Game Designer I was responsible for:

  • Design and concept of all three minigames.
  • Adjusting minigames according to playtester feedback.
  • Tuning and balancing to make sure that scoring system allows both casual play and mastery.

As a Programmer I was responsible for:

  • Programming of all gameplay elements, including the game's unique needs relating to physics and sequencing.
  • Implementation of all UI, audio, and easter eggs.
  • Creating system to read input from the physical controller's arduino and pass that to Unity.
